flawed_nl_solution:
Joseph gave 16 x 3/8 = <<16*3/8=128/3>>128/3 cards to his brother.
He gave a total of 128/3 + 2 = <<128/3+2=134/3>>134/3 cards to his brother and friend.
Joseph has 16 - 134/3 = <<16-134/3=-86/3>>-86/3 cards left.
This is -86/3/16 x 100% = -1075/6% of his cards.
#### -1075/6

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 6, not 128/3. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
